hero.title: HUA UI
hero.subtitle: Beautiful and accessible React component library
hero.description: A component library built on Tailwind CSS, providing 60+ components. Supports dark mode and is fully customizable.

components.title: 60+ Components
components.description: All commonly used components including Button, Card, Modal, Input, and more.

darkMode.title: Dark Mode Support
darkMode.description: Automatically detects system settings to support dark mode.

accessible.title: Accessibility First
accessible.description: Complies with WCAG 2.1 AA standards to ensure accessibility for all users.

customizable.title: Fully Customizable
customizable.description: Easily change styles using Tailwind CSS and CVA.

typescript.title: TypeScript
typescript.description: Improve developer productivity with perfect type support.

treeShakeable.title: Tree-shakeable
treeShakeable.description: Only used components are included in the bundle, minimizing bundle size.

cta.title: Get Started Now
cta.description: Install with npm or pnpm and start using immediately.
